Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = true
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end

local Tool = script.Parent local Blade = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid local vPlayer
local terror local throwRing
local cloneId = 68452456
local maxDistance = 45.0
local awayFromCharacter = false
local clone = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(cloneId):GetChildren()[1] local currentClone
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
while Tool:FindFirstChild("ThrowRing") == nil do wait() end
local damage = 13
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1.25) end end
function blow(hit) if hit and hit.Parent then local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and myHumanoid and humanoid ~= myHumanoid then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) awayFromCharacter = false end end end
function returnToCharacter(cloneBlade) if cloneBlade and myTorso then local distance = (cloneBlade.Position - myTorso.Position).magnitude local lookAt = (myTorso.Position - cloneBlade.Position).unit while distance > 4.0 and cloneBlade do cloneBlade.Velocity = lookAt * 45.0 if cloneBlade then lookAt = (myTorso.Position - cloneBlade.Position).unit distance = (myTorso.Position - cloneBlade.Position).magnitude end wait() end if cloneBlade then cloneBlade:Remove() cloneBlade = nil end wait(0.25) end end
function throw(cloneBlade, direction) local spawnPos = Blade.Position + direction * 4.0 cloneBlade.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + direction) cloneBlade.CanCollide = false
cloneBlade.Velocity = direction * 45.0 cloneBlade.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0, 40, 0)
local floatForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") floatForce.force = Vector3.new(0, cloneBlade:GetMass() * 196.1, 0) floatForce.Parent = cloneBlade
cloneBlade.Parent = game.Workspace
cloneBlade.Touched:connect(function(hit) blow(hit) end)
awayFromCharacter = true
local distance = (cloneBlade.Position - spawnPos).magnitude while awayFromCharacter and distance < maxDistance do distance = (cloneBlade.Position - spawnPos).magnitude wait(0.25) end awayFromCharacter = false returnToCharacter(cloneBlade) end
throwRing = Tool.ThrowRing throwRing.Changed:connect(function() if throwRing and throwRing.Value == true and myHumanoid then Blade.Transparency = 1.0 local cloneBlade = Blade:Clone() cloneBlade.Transparency = 0.0 local target = throwRing.Target.Value local direction = (target - Blade.Position).unit coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() throw(cloneBlade, direction) end)) Tool.Enabled = false wait(7.0) Tool.Enabled = true Blade.Transparency = 0.0 throwRing.Value = false end end)
while Tool:FindFirstChild("Terror") == nil do wait() end
function spawnClone(character, torso) if character and torso and clone then local thisClone = clone:Clone()
thisClone.Name = vCharacter.Name .. "'s Clone"
local target = thisClone:FindFirstChild("Target") if target then target.Value = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") else target = Instance.new("ObjectValue") target.Name = "Target" target.Parent = thisClone target.Value = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end
local cloneAIScript = Tool.CloneAIScript cloneAIScript.Parent = vCharacter
while cloneAIScript:FindFirstChild("CloneVal") == nil do wait() end cloneAIScript.CloneVal.Value = thisClone
cloneAIScript.Disabled = false
thisClone.Parent = game.Workspace thisClone:MoveTo(torso.Position + Vector3.new(5, 0, 5)) debris:AddItem(cloneAIScript, 11) debris:AddItem(clone, 12) end end
terror = Tool.Terror terror.Changed:connect(function() if terror and terror.Value == true then local players = game.Players:GetChildren() for i = 1, #players do if players[i] and players[i] ~= vPlayer and players[i].Character and players[i].Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") and myTorso then local torso = players[i].Character.Torso local distance = (torso.Position - myTorso.Position).magnitude if distance < 35 then spawnClone(players[i].Character, torso) end end end wait(45.0) terror.Value = false end end)
function dressClone() if vCharacter then local children = vCharacter:GetChildren() for i = 1, #children do if children[i] then if children[i].ClassName == "Hat" then -- Special local hat = Instance.new("Hat") local Hpart = children[i].Handle:clone() Hpart.Parent = hat Hpart.Position = clone.Head.Position hat.Name = children[i].Name hat.Parent = clone hat.AttachmentPos = children[i].AttachmentPos hat.AttachmentRight = children[i].AttachmentRight hat.AttachmentUp = children[i].AttachmentUp hat.AttachmentForward = children[i].AttachmentForward elseif children[i]:IsA("BasePart") or children[i].ClassName == "ForceField" or children[i].ClassName == "Script" or children[i].ClassName == "LocalScript" then -- Ignore it else children[i]:Clone().Parent = clone end end end end end
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) clone = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(cloneId):GetChildren()[1] dressClone() end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped)

while script:FindFirstChild("CloneVal") == nil do wait() end
local clone = script.CloneVal
while clone.Value == nil do wait() end
clone = clone.Value
--local clone = script.Parent
while clone:FindFirstChild("Target") == nil do wait() end
local target = clone.Target
if target.Value == nil then clone:Remove() end
local cloneHumanoid = clone:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local cloneTorso = clone:FindFirstChild("Torso")
local enemyHumanoid = target.Value
if cloneHumanoid then cloneHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 24.0 end
function slash(hit) if hit and hit.Parent then local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid ~= cloneHumanoid and humanoid == enemyHumanoid then humanoid:TakeDamage(15) if humanoid.Health == 0 then wait(2.0) if clone then clone:Remove() end if script then script:Remove() end end end end end
cloneTorso.Touched:connect(slash)
local children = clone:GetChildren() for i = 1, #children do if children[i].ClassName == "Tool" then if children[i]:FindFirstChild("Handle") then children[i].Handle.Touched:connect(slash) end end end
local targetEnemy = enemyHumanoid.Parent local targetEnemyTorso
if targetEnemy then targetEnemyTorso = targetEnemy:FindFirstChild("Torso") if targetEnemyTorso == nil then clone:Remove() end else clone:Remove() end
local animating = false
local checkAOE = Vector3.new(15, 15, 15)
while true do local ray = game.Workspace:FindPartOnRay(Ray.new(cloneTorso.Position + Vector3.new(0, -2, 0), cloneTorso.CFrame.lookVector * 5.0), nil) if ray and cloneHumanoid and ray.Parent ~= targetEnemy then cloneHumanoid.Jump = true end if targetEnemyTorso then local distance = (targetEnemyTorso.Position - cloneTorso.Position).magnitude local targetEnemy = targetEnemyTorso.Parent local targetEnemyHumanoid = targetEnemy:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") cloneHumanoid:MoveTo(targetEnemyTorso.Position, targetEnemyTorso) if distance < 4 and not animating then animating = true local slashAnim = cloneHumanoid:LoadAnimation(script:FindFirstChild("SlashAnim")) if slashAnim then slashAnim:Play() end coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() wait(1.25) animating = false end)) end else clone:Remove() end wait() end

local Tool = script.Parent local Blade = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid local vPlayer
Tool.Enabled = true
local slashAnim
local throwRing local terror
local damage = 22
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
function terrorize(key, pos) key = key:lower() if vCharacter and myTorso and myHumanoid then if key == "q" then print("Throw ring") throwRing = Tool:FindFirstChild("ThrowRing") if throwRing and throwRing.Value == false then print("Throwing") throwRing.Target.Value = pos throwRing.Value = true end elseif key == "r" then print("Terrorize") terror = Tool:FindFirstChild("Terror") throwRing = Tool:FindFirstChild("ThrowRing") if terror and terror.Value == false then terror.Value = true end end end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1.25) end end
function blow(hit) if hit and hit.Parent and Blade.Transparency == 0 then local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and myHumanoid and humanoid ~= myHumanoid then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) end end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
if throwRing and throwRing.Value == true then return end
Tool.Enabled = false slashAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.SlashAnim) if slashAnim then slashAnim:Play() end wait(1.25) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) end
Tool.KeyDown.OnServerEvent:connect(function(client, ...) if client.Character == Tool.Parent then terrorize(...) end end)
function onUnequipped() if slashAnim then slashAnim:Stop() end end
Tool.Mouse1Down.OnServerEvent:connect(function(client) if client.Character == Tool.Parent then onActivated() end end) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
Blade.Touched:connect(blow)
while Tool:FindFirstChild("Terror") == nil do wait() end
while Tool:FindFirstChild("ThrowRing") == nil do wait() end
throwRing = Tool.ThrowRing terror = Tool.Terror

local UIS, CAS = game:GetService'UserInputService', game:GetService'ContextActionService' local GamepadButtonConnection
script.Parent.Equipped:connect(function(mouse) mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(key) script.Parent.KeyDown:FireServer(key, mouse.Hit.p) end) mouse.Button1Down:connect(function(...) script.Parent.Mouse1Down:FireServer() end)
if UIS.TouchEnabled then local tossEnabled = true CAS:BindActionToInputTypes( 'SpectralSword_Toss', function(name, state, input) if tossEnabled and state == Enum.UserInputState.Begin then tossEnabled = false spawn(function() script.Parent.KeyDown:FireServer('q', script.Parent.Parent.HumanoidRootPart.CFrame*Vector3.new(0, 0, -32))
local button = CAS:GetButton('SpectralSword_Toss') button.ImageColor3 = Color3.new(1/2, 1/2, 1/2) wait(7) button.ImageColor3 = Color3.new(1, 1, 1) tossEnabled = true end) end end, true, '' ) local terrorEnabled = true CAS:BindActionToInputTypes( 'SpectralSword_Terror', function(name, state, input) if terrorEnabled and state == Enum.UserInputState.Begin then terrorEnabled = false spawn(function() script.Parent.KeyDown:FireServer('e')
local button = CAS:GetButton'SpectralSword_Terror' button.ImageColor3 = Color3.new(1/2, 1/2, 1/2) wait(45) button.ImageColor3 = Color3.new(1,1,1) terrorEnabled = true end) end end, true, '' ) CAS:SetTitle('SpectralSword_Toss', 'Toss') CAS:SetTitle('SpectralSword_Terror', 'Terror') end
-- Gamepad support local GPButtons = { ButtonB = false, -- Slash ButtonX = false, -- Throw ButtonY = false -- Terror }
GamepadButtonConnection = UIS.InputChanged:connect(function(input) pcall(function() -- This will break until gamepad support is enabled if input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Gamepad1 then local button = input.KeyCode.Name
if GPButtons[button] ~= nil then local currentDown = input.Position.Z > 0.5
if GPButtons[button] ~= currentDown then GPButtons[button] = currentDown
if currentDown then if button == 'ButtonB' then script.Parent.Mouse1Down:FireServer() elseif button == 'ButtonX' then script.Parent.KeyDown:FireServer('q', script.Parent.Parent.HumanoidRootPart.CFrame*Vector3.new(0, 0, -32)) elseif button == 'ButtonY' then script.Parent.KeyDown:FireServer('e') end end end end end end) end) end)
script.Parent.Unequipped:connect(function() if UIS.TouchEnabled then CAS:UnbindAction('SpectralSword_Toss') CAS:UnbindAction('SpectralSword_Terror') end
if GamepadButtonConnection then GamepadButtonConnection:disconnect() end end)
